title: KISS - Expanded Alive II (by }{eywood)
description:
KISS
Alive II
expanded by }{eywood

Ah Alive II. An album I grew up playing every day, familiar as a pair of old shoes. Everything about it, the canned audience, Gene's worn out voice, thew abridged guitar and drum solos, is ingrained into my brain. Is it a good live album? Is it even live? That's for you to decide.

But Alive II isn't the Alive II that was originally planned. A whole album was mixed and assembled, then shelved, ultimately never to be released. The Lost Alive II has circulated amongst bootleggers for many years. This is actually a better album than the released one.

So what I've done here is to expand the released Alive II with the Lost Alive II. I've added songs that weren't there, longer solos, new sequencing, songs they avoided because they were already on Alive.

BTW, It's certainly not all live. Hard Luck Woman and Tomorrow And Tonight were never played live before the album was released.

01 Detroit Rock City
02 King of the Nighttime World
03 Take Me
04 Ladies' Room
05 Makin' Love
06 Love Gun
07 I Stole Your Love
08 Christine Sixteen
09 I Want You
10 Shock Me
11 Ace's Solo
12 Hard Luck Woman
13 Cold Gin
14 Do You Love Me
15 Calling Dr. Love
16 Tomorrow and Tonight
17 God of Thunder/drum solo
18 Rock and Roll All Nite
19 Beth
20 Shout It Out Loud
21 All American Man
22 Rockin' In The USA
23 Larger Than Life
24 Rocket Ride
25 Any Way You Want It
